articles.title: Who is Matthew Kacsmaryk, the judge overseeing the fate of abortion pill mifepristone?
articles.description: A Texas lawsuit brought by conservative groups is seeking to overturn the Food and Drug Administration’s approval of a widely used abortion pill, mifepristone. U.S. District Judge Matthew Kacsmaryk, who was appointed by then-President Donald Trump, is overseeing the case.
